H0.text: Jupiter is always closer to the Sun than it is to Earth.

H1.text: Mercury is always closer to the Sun than it is to Earth.

H2.text: Saturn is always closer to the Sun than it is to Earth.

H3.text: Uranus is always closer to the Sun than it is to Earth.

A4.text: Mercury is the first planet from the Sun and the smallest in the Solar System.
